short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A Chrome extension for manipulating and viewing CSS properties directly on the page.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: An intuitive Chrome extension that allows users to manipulate and view CSS properties directly on any webpage. It provides a convenient, real-time interface to adjust styles, preview changes, and enhance web design workflows without needing to dive into developer tools.
